sn36.15:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn36.15:4.2: upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn36.15:4.3: “katamā nu kho, bhante, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.15:4.4: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.15:4.6: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.15:4.10: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṃ—
sn36.15:4.13: Yaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vedanāya assādo.
sn36.15:4.14: Yaṃ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ vedanāya ādīnavo.
sn36.15:4.15: Yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ vedanāya nissaraṇaṃ.
sn36.15:4.16: Atha kho panānanda, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodho akkhāto.
sn36.15:4.17: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hoti … pe …
sn36.15:4.18: saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca niruddhā honti.
sn36.15:4.19: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.15:4.20: Atha kho panānanda, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ vūpasamo akkhāto.
sn36.15:4.21: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā vūpasantā hoti … pe …
sn36.15:4.22: saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca vūpasantā honti.
sn36.15:4.23: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo vūpasanto hoti, doso vūpasanto hoti, moho vūpasanto hoti.
sn36.15:4.24: Atha kho panānanda, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhi akkhātā.
sn36.15:4.25: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā hoti … pe …
sn36.15:4.30: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.15:4.31: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
